name: GARMM Adventurer Vol.1
description:
Alright, picture this: You're stepping into the shoes of the main character, this super cool dude who's got these huge dreams that won't fit in his small village. So, he decides it's time to shake things up and become an adventurer. No more chilling with the elders and the calm village life, he's ready to dive into the unknown.

Off he goes to this massive city, where the streets are alive with hustle and bustle. But it's not all sunshine and rainbows – his main mission? Find a woman to have sex with. But wait, it's not gonna be a simple "Hey, you wanna have sex with me?" deal. Nope, to win over an awesome girl's heart, he's gotta roll up his sleeves, take on some challenges, and dive headfirst into these crazy missions. And trust me, with all the wild stuff happening in the city, it's not gonna be a walk in the park.

Key Features
linear storytelling in the style of visual novel games. You'll meet lots of cool characters in the game, and you can become friends with them or have a good affair with them.

Battles

You'll have exciting turn base battles in the game, where you can pick your decision and make smart choices during fights to beat'em all for your survival and build your relationship to lead to the thing you love... I mean really really LOVE.
